skills.title: Front-End

skills.title: Back-End

skills.title: AWS Skills
skills.description: Hands-on experience deploying and managing AWS services, including Lambda, RDS, ECR, ECS, EC2 instances, S3 storage, and Step Functions.

skills.title: Python Skills
skills.description: Applied Python object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and acquired proficiency in NumPy and Pandas for efficient data manipulation and analysis.

portfolio.title: Recuitment Process Automation
portfolio.description: Coded a recruitment process automation to rate resumes based on their skill count, and deployed this on aws ecs instance with docker images, also used various google service apis for data manipulation

portfolio.title: Auction Mobility Project
portfolio.description: Developed APIs that were well tested with valid responses for all edge conditions, to facilitate auctioneers to put on their data onto auction lots and also handle complex data dumps with bulk import of auction lots

portfolio.title: Blog Website about my Travels
portfolio.description: Created a blog that consisted of a photogallery of my travels in Goa, and showcased a modern ui to present my ideas and thoughts about it.

testimonial.description: Remarkable coding ability and a disciplined work ethic characterize his contributions.
Helped leverage AWS expertise to implement scalable solutions for our systems run smoothly.
Exemplifyied a disciplined work ethic and coding finesse in every project.
